tagline: Unlock Radiant Complexion with Every Drop
description: GlowBoost Vitamin C Serum is a potent, oil-free formula that helps brighten and even out your complexion, while fading dark spots and discoloration. Enriched with 10% Vitamin C and Hyaluronic Acid, this serum is perfect for oily and combination skin types.
key_features: Brightens and even out skin tone
Enriched with Hyaluronic Acid for hydration

ingredients.Vitamin C: A potent antioxidant that neutralizes free radicals, brightening and protecting the skin.
ingredients.Hyaluronic Acid: A natural humectant that retains moisture, leaving skin hydrated and supple.

usage_guide.full_instructions: Apply 2–3 drops in the morning before sunscreen.
usage_guide.tips: Gently pat the serum into the skin, allowing it to absorb fully before applying sunscreen for optimal results.

precautions: May cause mild tingling for sensitive skin
Discontinue use if irritation persists or worsens
Avoid applying to broken or sensitive areas
safety_information.suitable_for_sensitive_skin: With caution: may cause mild tingling, discontinue use if irritation persists or worsens
